document_data.name: Scroll of Protection from Heat
document_data.mainbody: '''''Scroll of protection from heat''''' was a [[magic]]al [[scroll]] found in [[Zakhara]], the Land of Fate.
document_data.Description: Reading this scroll created a stationary area of protection centered around the caster, with a diameter of {{SI|10|yd|long=yes}}. Within the area of protection, the effects were similar to the ''[[cool strength]]'' [[spell]] and lasted for three days. Those within the protected area were not affected by the heat of the sun.
